email-test.subject: Email Test
email-test.passwordUpdate: You updated the password for your Twitch account on {{date}}. If this was you, then no further action is required.
email-test.passwordReset: However if you did NOT perform this password change, please reset your account password immediately.
email-test.passwordAdvice: Remember to use a password that is both strong and unique to your Twitch account. To learn more about how to create a strong and unique password,
email-test.contactSupport: Still have questions? Please contact {{realmName}} Support

email-update-confirmation.subject: Verify new email
email-update-confirmation.updateEmailAddress: To update your {{realmName}} account with email address {{newEmail}}
email-update-confirmation.ignoreMessage: If you don't want to proceed with this modification, just ignore this message.

email-verification.subject: Verify email
email-verification.message: Someone has created a {{firstName}} account with this email address. If this was you, click the link below to verify your email address.
email-verification.ignoreMessage: If you didn't create this account, just ignore this message.

event-login_error.subject: Login error
event-login_error.message: A failed login attempt was detected to your account on {{date}} from {{ipAddress}}.
event-login_error.contactAdmin: If this was not you, please contact an administrator.

event-remove_credential.subject: Remove credential
event-remove_credential.message: Credential {{credentialType}} was removed from your account on {{date}} from {{ipAddress}}.
event-remove_credential.contactAdmin: If this was not you, please contact an administrator.

event-remove_totp.subject: Remove OTP
event-remove_totp.message: OTP was removed from your account on {{date}} from {{ipAddress}}.
event-remove_totp.contactAdmin: If this was not you, please contact an administrator.

event-update_credential.subject: Update credential
event-update_credential.message: Your {{credentialType}} credential was changed on {{date}} from {{ipAddress}}.
event-update_credential.contactAdmin: If this was not you, please contact an administrator.

event-update_password.subject: Update password
event-update_password.message: Your password was changed on {{date}} from {{ipAddress}}.
event-update_password.contactAdmin: If this was not you, please contact an administrator.

event-update_totp.subject: Update OTP
event-update_totp.message: OTP was updated for your account on {{date}} from {{ipAddress}}.
event-update_totp.contactAdmin: If this was not you, please contact an administrator.

event-user_disabled_by_permanent_lockout.subject: User disabled by permanent lockout
event-user_disabled_by_permanent_lockout.message: Your user has been disabled permanently because of multiple failed attempts on {{date}}.

event-user_disabled_by_temporary_lockout.subject: User disabled by temporary lockout
event-user_disabled_by_temporary_lockout.message: Your user has been disabled temporarily because of multiple failed attempts on {{date}}.

executeActions.subject: Update Your Account
executeActions.message: Your administrator has just requested that you update your {{realmName}} account by performing the following action(s):
executeActions.clickLink: Click on the link below to start this process.
executeActions.ignoreMessage: If you are unaware that your administrator has requested this, just ignore this message and nothing will be changed.

identity-provider-link.subject: Link {0} with your account
identity-provider-link.message: Someone wants to link your {{identityProviderDisplayName}} account with {{realmName}} account of user {{username}}.
identity-provider-link.clickLink: If this was you, click the link below to link accounts
identity-provider-link.ignoreMessage: If you don't want to proceed with this modification, just ignore this message.
identity-provider-link.loginInfo: If you link accounts, you will be able to login to {{identityProviderDisplayName}} through {{realmName}}.

org-invite.subject: Invitation to join the {0} organization
org-invite.message: You were invited to join the {{organizationName}} organization. Click the link below to join.
org-invite.ignoreMessage: If you don't want to join the organization, just ignore this message.

password-reset.subject: Reset password
password-reset.message: Someone just requested to change your {{realmName}} account's credentials. If this was you, click on the link below to reset them.
password-reset.ignoreMessage: If you don't want to reset your credentials, just ignore this message and nothing will be changed.
